metadata.title: Roberto Justo | IT Portfolio
metadata.description: Professional portfolio of Roberto Justo - Front-End Tech Lead specialized in Salesforce, with experience in national and international B2B e-commerce projects.

home.title: Home
home.heroDescription: With years of experience in web development, I specialize in building and architecting Salesforce applications, focused on B2B e-commerce for national and international clients. I lead front-end teams, collaborating with different squads to deliver efficient and scalable solutions.
home.summaryText: Front-End Tech Lead with solid experience in web development and Salesforce application architecture. My work goes beyond code: I participate in strategic meetings, use agile methodologies, and contribute to technical decisions. I meet directly with clients and DevOps teams, ensuring solutions are aligned with business needs. Committed to best practices, quality, performance, and innovation, I currently also build features and projects with artificial intelligence, using AI agents to ensure better quality, testing, agility, and scalability.

personal.title: About Me
personal.subtitle: Get to know my story and trajectory
personal.bio: With years of experience in web development, I specialize in building and architecting Salesforce applications, focused on e-commerce for national and international clients. I am committed to development best practices, always seeking quality, performance, and innovation. I consider myself a polite, sociable, and determined person who values transparency and professionalism.

project1.name: All in One (AIO)
project1.description: Robust portal within Salesforce with over 90 pages, expanding Commerce Lite with full B2B areas. Present in Brazil, Chile, Romania, South Africa, and Poland markets. I led all front-end development across all markets.
project1.techs: Salesforce LWC, Apex, JavaScript, CSS, SOQL

project2.name: Commerce Lite
project2.description: Lightweight Salesforce portal enabling BAT retailers to purchase products, access promotions, and track orders in few screens. Deployed in Brazil, Poland, Malaysia, and South Africa.

project3.name: OmniRep
project3.description: Salesforce portal for BAT sales representatives, featuring sales and purchase charts organized by hierarchy (Area, Regional, Territory, Retailer). Markets: South Africa and New Zealand.
project3.techs: Salesforce LWC, Apex, JavaScript, CSS, Chart.js

project4.name: Commerce IQ Dashboards
project4.description: Commercial intelligence dashboards for Chile, with metrics processed by AI that return personalized product recommendations for each retailer.

project5.name: Promotions Feature
project5.description: Complex promotion combination registration system in an admin portal, integrated with the AIO portal so retailers earn product discounts. Deployed in Brazil, Chile, and South Africa.

project6.name: Initial B2B Portals
project6.description: Styling and development of B2B portals for clients including Clube de Prêmios, Essilor, Conecta Você, Conecta Negócios (BAT), and Amil Dental admin portal.
